WorkOrderLineItemHistory.name: WorkOrderLineItemHistory
WorkOrderLineItemHistory.description: Represents the history of changes made to tracked fields on a work order line item.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: The value of the field before it was changed.

WorkOrderLineItemId.description: ID of the work order line item being tracked. The history is displayed on the detail page for this record.
